title: 为啥BC和林业冲突了
author: 谷歌能吃么
txt_content:
本帖最后由 谷歌能吃么 于 2012-8-10 12:07 编辑 

错误信息：
最新汉化补丁请访问Minecraft中文下载站论坛！
11 mods loaded
Optifine OptiFine_1.2.5_HD_S_C6
Minecraft Forge 3.3.8.152
FML v2.2.78.153
Forge Mod Loader version 2.2.78.153 for Minecraft 1.2.5
        mod_CodeChickenCore : Post-initialized (CodeChickenCore-Client 0.5.5.zip)
        mod_MinecraftForge : Post-initialized (minecraft.jar)
        mod_NotEnoughItems : Post-initialized (minecraft.jar)
        mod_SmartMoving : Post-initialized (1.2.5Smart Moving Client for ModLoader.zip)
        mod_ReiMinimap : Post-initialized ([1.2.4]ReiMinimap_v3.0_04汉化版by大刘.zip)
        mod_BuildCraftCore : Post-initialized (buildcraft-client-all-2.2.14.zip)
        mod_BuildCraftBuilders : Initialized (buildcraft-client-all-2.2.14.zip)
        mod_BuildCraftEnergy : Initialized (buildcraft-client-all-2.2.14.zip)
        mod_BuildCraftFactory : Initialized (buildcraft-client-all-2.2.14.zip)
        mod_BuildCraftTransport : Initialized (buildcraft-client-all-2.2.14.zip)
        mod_Forestry : Initialized (forestry-client-A-1.4.8.6_bc2.2.jar)


      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.




--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 5e3a2c8d --------
Generated 12-8-10 下午12:10

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: Intel 965/963 Graphics Media Accelerator version 2.0.0 - Build 8.14.10.1930, Intel

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Slot 201 is already occupied by forestry.cultivation.BlockPlanter@13bcdc1 when adding buildcraft.builders.BlockMarker@1417b29
        at pb.<init>(Block.java:251)
        at agy.<init>(BlockContainer.java:7)
        at buildcraft.builders.BlockMarker.<init>(BlockMarker.java:31)
        at BuildCraftBuilders.initialize(BuildCraftBuilders.java:81)
        at mod_BuildCraftBuilders.modsLoaded(mod_BuildCraftBuilders.java:41)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer.postInit(ModLoaderModContainer.java:357)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.postModInit(Loader.java:280)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.initializeMods(Loader.java:605)
        at cpw.mods.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.onLoadComplete(FMLClientHandler.java:203)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:426)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:735)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 27d39479 ----------














另外我把两个mod的id都配置好了，应该没有冲突
林业配置# Configuration file
# Generated on 12-8-10 ??9:29

####################
# block 
####################

block {
   beehives=161
   candle=1378
   engine=162
   firsapling=163
   harvester=164
   machine=165
   mill=166
   mushroom=1375
   planter=167
   resources=168
   sapling=1376
   soil=169
   stump=1379
}

####################
# general 
####################

general {
   # set to false if apiaries should output all items regardless of side a pipe is attached to
   apiary.sidesensitive=false
   # change breeding modes here. possible values NORMAL, EASY, HARDCORE, FTB
   beebreeding.difficulty=NORMAL
   # set to true to track beebreeding globally instead of per single world. will not merge past histories!
   beebreeding.history.unified=false
   # add additional flower blocks for apiaries here in the format id:meta. separate blocks using ';'. will be treated like vanilla flowers. not recommended for flowers implemented as tile entities.
   beekeeping.flowers.custom=
   # set to false to disable crafting recipe for bronze
   crafting.bronze.enabled=true
   # set to false to disable crafting recipes for all farms (harvesters and planters)
   crafting.farms.enabled=true
   # set to false to disable crafting recipes for stamps
   crafting.stamps.enabled=true
   # set to true to make dungeon loot generated by forestry rarer
   difficulty.dungeonloot.rare=false
   # set to true to clear chromosomes which contain invalid alleles. might rescue your save if it is crashing after removal of a bee addon.
   genetics.invalid.chromosome.clearing=false
   # set to false if harvesters should output all harvested products regardless of side a pipe is attached to
   harvesters.sidesensitive=true
   # leaving this enabled will cycle the list of active players PER INGAME TICK to check for resupply via backpack. you want to set this to false on busy servers.
   performance.backpacks.resupply=true
   # set to false if farms should output all harvested products regardless of side a pipe is attached to
   planters.sidesensitive=true
   power.framework=forestry.energy.BioPowerFramework
   # set to false to disable particle fx on slower machines
   presentation.particleFX.enabled=true
   # higher numbers increase working speeds of harvesters but also increase cpu load.
   throttle.harvester=200
   # higher numbers increase working speeds of planters but also increase cpu load.
   throttle.planter=10
   # set to false to disable apple pickup by appropriate harvesters
   tweaks.apple.pickup.enabled=true
   # set to true to disable energy statistics on energy consumers.
   tweaks.energystat.disabled=true
   # set to true to disable hints on machine and engine guis.
   tweaks.hints.disabled=false
   # set to false to disable the mail alert box
   tweaks.mailalert.enabled=true
   # set to true to disable displaying liquid amounts in tank tooltips.
   tweaks.tooltip.liquidamount.disabled=true
   # set to false to force forestry to skip generating own apatite ore blocks in the world
   world.generate.apatite=true
   # set to false to force forestry to skip generating beehives in the world
   world.generate.beehives=true
   # set to false to force forestry to skip generating own copper ore blocks in the world
   world.generate.copper=true
   # set to false to force forestry to skip generating own tin ore blocks in the world
   world.generate.tin=true
}

####################
# item 
####################

item {

   beebreeding.difficulty=NORMAL

replies.txt_content: 楼主，为什么你给的林业配置信息和建筑配置信息都一样？ 然后冲突的方块是ID 201我记得是那个路标，也许不是

replies.author: 谷歌能吃么
replies.txt_content:
306049350 发表于 2012-8-10 12:52 
楼主，为什么你给的林业配置信息和建筑配置信息都一样？ 然后冲突的方块是ID 201我记得是那个路标，也许不是 ...
好吧，我发现了，我的ID配置文件搞好了没保存
